1.Name: Siphon Life
1.Desc: Drain health from enemies in front of you while they are in the radius

2.Name: Shoulder Charge
2.Desc: **Charge forward**, colliding with enemies and draging them along. Hitting a **wall** will **Stun** enemies caught by Abrams. Speed increased after colliding with enemy Heroes

Levels.5: +5.5 Weapon Damage for 8s after colliding with an enemy

3.Name: Infernal Resilience
3.Desc: **Regenerate** a portion of incoming damage over time

4.Name: Seismic Impact
4.Desc: **Leap high into the air** and choose a ground location to crash into. When you hit the ground, **all enemies in the radius are damage and stunned**. Press [LMB] to crash down early

Levels.2: Gain 100 Max HP and 15% Fire Rate per hero hit. Lasts 25s
Levels.5: On cast, become Immune to Stun, Silence,Sleep, Root, and Disarm. Expires 3s after landing

1.Name: Exploding Uppercut
1.Desc: Deal **Light Melee** damage to nearby units and send them **flying back**, causing **area damage** where they land. Does not damage allies

Levels.2: On uppercut enemy Hero, gain fast spin up time, 2x range, and +60% weapon damage for 12s
Levels.5: On uppercut enemy hero, set Hook Cooldown to 0 and instantly +100% bullets to your current clip
